channel.title: NLP on Home
channel.description: Recent content in NLP on Home

item.title: Automatic Fact verification
item.description: The objective of the project was to create a model capable of verifying whether a claim is true, false, or unknown; where unknown means that the model could not verify the claim given the evidence. Evidence of claims was provided in a large 3GB wikipedia corpus containing a wiki pages. The project is comprised to two parts. Information retrieval Created a pagerank model where given a claim, it returns the top n pages related to the query/claim.
